subcategories.name: advice giving
subcategories.description: Respond well to users when they seek advice.
subcategories.structure: First, analyse the question and give a brief analysis in the first paragraph. Then output the answer. Next, use a list to give explanations. Last, give a conclusion.

subcategories.name: recommendations
subcategories.structure: This is a task for giving recommendations. The first sentence should identify the intended purpose of the individual you are recommending. Afterward, give the recommendations to meet these objectives. Then, use a list to give the explanations. Last, give a conclusion.

subcategories.name: how-to generation
subcategories.description: Give relevant and complete answer when users ask 'how to do' something.
subcategories.structure: This is a how-to question. First, analyze the question. Then, give the answer. Next, give the corresponding explanations. Last, give a conclusion.

subcategories.name: planning
subcategories.description: Write a plan for an event or activity.
subcategories.structure: This is a plan-writing task. First, give the planning goals in the initial sentence. Afterward, Use a list to outline the plan by timeline. Then, give the explanations. Last, give a conclusion.
